venue.name: Blackstone River Valley Bikeway @ The Blackstone River State Park

item.description:
Hi All,

I like to ride early when there is no traffic on the Bike Path. We will start down the path at 7:00 AM Yes that's AM ..LOL . It will be a 20 mile ride. Looking forward to a nice morning ride..Hope to see you there ...AJ.... I am bringing my rollerblades to go rolleblading after the bike rideÂ if anyone is interested ..
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the Blue Jeep Wrangler
item.name: Early Bird Bike Ride followed by Rollerblading
